014
015package de.softwareforge.testing.maven;
016
017import static org.assertj.core.api.Assertions.assertThat;
018
019import java.io.File;
020import java.io.IOException;
021import java.util.LinkedList;
022import java.util.List;
023import java.util.Optional;
024
025import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
026
027public final class TestMavenArtifactLoader {
028
029    static final String GROUP_ID = "de.softwareforge.testing";
030    static final String ARTIFACT_ID = "maven-loader";
031
032    @Test
033    void testFindVersion21X() throws IOException {
034        MavenArtifactLoader loader = new MavenArtifactLoader();
035
036        List<String> results = loader.builder(GROUP_ID, ARTIFACT_ID)
037                .includeSnapshots(false)
038                .partialMatch("2.1")
039                .findAll();
040
041        assertThat(results)
042                .isNotEmpty()
043                .contains("2.1.0", "2.1.1")
044                .doesNotContain("2.1.0-SNAPSHOT");
045    }
046
047    @Test
048    void testFindVersion210() throws IOException {
049        MavenArtifactLoader loader = new MavenArtifactLoader();
050
051        List<String> results = loader.builder(GROUP_ID, ARTIFACT_ID)
052                .includeSnapshots(false)
053                .exactMatch("2.1.0")
054                .findAll();
055
056        assertThat(results)
057                .isNotEmpty()
058                .containsExactly("2.1.0");
059    }
060
061    @Test
062    void testFindSnapshotVersion210() throws IOException {
063        MavenArtifactLoader loader = new MavenArtifactLoader();
064
065        List<String> results = loader.builder(GROUP_ID, ARTIFACT_ID)
066                .includeSnapshots(true)
067                .partialMatch("2.1")
068                .findAll();
069
070        assertThat(results)
071                .isNotEmpty()
072                .contains("2.1.0-SNAPSHOT");
073    }
074
075    @Test
076    void testSemVerMajor() throws IOException {
077        MavenArtifactLoader loader = new MavenArtifactLoader();
078
079        List<String> results = loader.builder(GROUP_ID, ARTIFACT_ID)
080                .semVerMajor(1)
081                .includeSnapshots(false)
082                .findAll();
083
084        assertThat(results)
085                .contains("1.0", "1.1")
086                .doesNotContain("2.0", "2.1.0");
087    }
088
089    @Test
090    void testSemVerMajorBest() throws IOException {
091        MavenArtifactLoader loader = new MavenArtifactLoader();
092
093        Optional<String> result = loader.builder(GROUP_ID, ARTIFACT_ID)
094                .semVerMajor(1)
095                .includeSnapshots(false)
096                .findBestMatch();
097
098        assertThat(result).isNotEmpty().contains("1.2");
099    }
100
101    @Test
102    void testSemVerMajor0OnlySnapshot() throws IOException {
103        MavenArtifactLoader loader = new MavenArtifactLoader();
104
105        Optional<String> result = loader.builder(GROUP_ID, ARTIFACT_ID)
106                .semVerMajor(0)
107                .findBestMatch();
108
109        assertThat(result).isNotEmpty()
110                .contains("0.1-SNAPSHOT");
111    }
112
113    @Test
114    void testSemVerMajorNotFound() throws IOException {
115        MavenArtifactLoader loader = new MavenArtifactLoader();
116
117        Optional<String> result = loader.builder(GROUP_ID, ARTIFACT_ID)
118                .semVerMajor(0)
119                .includeSnapshots(false)
120                .findBestMatch();
121
122        assertThat(result).isEmpty();
123    }
124
125    @Test
126    void testSemVerMinor() throws IOException {
127        MavenArtifactLoader loader = new MavenArtifactLoader();
128
129        List<String> results = loader.builder(GROUP_ID, ARTIFACT_ID)
130                .semVerMinor(2, 1)
131                .includeSnapshots(false)
132                .findAll();
133
134        assertThat(results)
135                .doesNotContain("1.0", "1.1", "2.0")
136                .contains("2.1.0", "2.1.1");
137    }
138
139
140    @Test
141    void testFindLatestVersion() throws IOException {
142        MavenArtifactLoader loader = new MavenArtifactLoader();
143
144        LinkedList<String> results = loader.builder(GROUP_ID, ARTIFACT_ID).findAll();
145
146        String latestVersion = loader.findLatestVersion(GROUP_ID, ARTIFACT_ID, "");
147
148        assertThat(results).isNotEmpty();
149        assertThat(latestVersion)
150                .isEqualTo(results.getLast());
151    }
152
153
154    @Test
155    void testLoadArtifact() throws IOException {
156        MavenArtifactLoader loader = new MavenArtifactLoader();
157
158        Optional<String> result = loader.builder(GROUP_ID, ARTIFACT_ID)
159                .includeSnapshots(false)
160                .partialMatch("2.1")
161                .findBestMatch();
162
163        assertThat(result).isPresent();
164
165        File artifactFile = loader.getArtifactFile(GROUP_ID, ARTIFACT_ID, result.get());
166
167        assertThat(artifactFile).exists();
168    }
169}
